de.dfki.omm.interfaces

Interface OMMBlock

  • All Superinterfaces:
    OMMToCEntry
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    OMMAttributeListBlock, OMMIdentifierBlock, OMMSemanticsBlock, OMMStructureBlock
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OMMAttributeListBlockImpl, OMMBlockImpl, OMMBlockRestImpl, OMMIdentifierBlockImpl, OMMSemanticsBlockImpl, OMMStructureBlockImpl

    public interface OMMBlock
extends OMMToCEntry
    Contains all meta data information of a OMM block.
    Author:
    Jens Haupert (jens.haupert@dfki.de)

      • setTitle

        void setTitle(OMMMultiLangText text,
              OMMEntity entity)
        Sets the title of this block to a new value. An OMMEvent is triggered.
        Parameters:
        text - the new title of this block
        entity - the entity that is performing this task

      • setTitle

        void setTitle(java.util.Locale language,
              java.lang.String title,
              OMMEntity entity)
        Sets a new title to this block. An OMMEvent is triggered.
        Parameters:
        language - the language of the title
        title - the title text
        entity - the entity that is performing this task

      • removeTitle

        boolean removeTitle(java.util.Locale language,
                    OMMEntity entity)
        Removes the title of the given language. The last remaining title cannot be removed. An OMMEvent is triggered.
        Parameters:
        language - the title tagged with this language is removed
        entity - the entity that is performing this task
        Returns:
        indicates whether this operation was successful (true) or not (false).

        entity - the entity that is performing this task

      • changeSubject

        void changeSubject(OMMSubjectTag oldSubject,
                   OMMSubjectTag newSubject,
                   OMMEntity entity)
        Replaces a given subject with a new one. An OMMEvent is triggered.
        Parameters:
        oldSubject - the old subject to replace
        newSubject - the new subject
        entity - the entity that is performing this task

      • removeSubject

        void removeSubject(OMMSubjectTag subject,
                   OMMEntity entity)
        Removes the given subject from this block. An OMMEvent is triggered.
        Parameters:
        subject - the subject to remove
        entity - the entity that is performing this task

      • removeSubjects

        void removeSubjects(OMMEntity entity)
        Removes all subjects from this block. An OMMEvent is triggered.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity that is performing this task

      • isLinkBlock

        boolean isLinkBlock()
        Indicates whether this block contains a link to the payload
        Returns:
        true if block is a LinkBlock

      • getLink

        TypedValue getLink()
        Gets the link of this block.
        Returns:
        the link as TypedValue

      • getLinkHash

        java.lang.String getLinkHash()
        Gets the hash value of the data indicated by the link
        Returns:
        the hash value as String

      • setLink

        void setLink(TypedValue link,
             OMMEntity entity)
        Sets the link of this block without giving a hash value. If the block contains a payload it is removed. An OMMEvent is triggered.
        Parameters:
        link - the link as TypedValue to set
        entity - the entity that is performing this task

      • setLink

        void setLink(TypedValue link,
             java.lang.String linkHash,
             OMMEntity entity)
        Sets the link of this block with an additional hash value. If the block contains a payload it is removed. An OMMEvent is triggered.
        Parameters:
        link - the link as TypedValue to set
        linkHash - the hash value of the data indicated by the link as String
        entity - the entity that is performing this task

      • removeLink

        void removeLink(OMMEntity entity)
        Removes the link of this block. An OMMEvent is triggered.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity that is performing this task

      • getPayload

        TypedValue getPayload()
        Gets the payload of this block.
        Returns:
        the payload as TypedValue

      • getPayloadAsString

        java.lang.String getPayloadAsString()
        Gets the payload as string. If the payload is encoded, the result will be decoded.
        Returns:
        The payload as String.

      • getPayloadEncoding

        java.lang.String getPayloadEncoding()
        Returns the encoding type of the payload as a String.
        Returns:
        encoding type of the payload as a String

      • getPayloadElement

        org.w3c.dom.Element getPayloadElement()
        Gets the payload JDOM Element of this block.
        Returns:
        payload JDOM Element of this block

      • setPayload

        void setPayload(TypedValue payload,
                OMMEntity entity)
        Sets the payload of this block. If a link was set, it will be removed. An OMMEvent is triggered.
        Parameters:
        payload - the payload as TypedValue to set
        entity - the entity that is performing this task

      • setPayload

        void setPayload(byte[] payload,
                OMMEntity entity)
        Sets the payload of this block. If a link was set, it will be removed. An OMMEvent is triggered.
        Parameters:
        payload - the payload as byte-array to set
        entity - the entity that is performing this task

      • removePayload

        void removePayload(OMMEntity entity)
        Removes the payload of this block. An OMMEvent is triggered.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity that is performing this task

      • getXMLElement

        org.w3c.dom.Element getXMLElement(boolean withPayload)
        Gets the XML-Code of the block. The given boolean flag withPayload controls if payload is included.
        Parameters:
        withPayload - true if payload is included
        Returns:
        XML-Code of the block as Element

      • getJsonRepresentation

        java.lang.String getJsonRepresentation()
        Creates a JSON object containing a complete representation of an OMMBlock.
        Returns:
        The JSON String.
